description: First row of spectral array W(sqrt(3)).
links: A. Fraenkel and C. Kimberling, Generalized Wythoff arrays, shuffles and interspersions, Discrete Mathematics 126 (1994) 137-149.
prog: (PARI)\\ The first row of the generalized Wythoff array W(h),\\   where h is an irrational number between 1 and 2.row1(h, m) = {  my(    a=vector(m, n, floor(n*h)),    b=setminus(vector(m, n, n), a),    w=[a[1]^2, b[a[1]]],    j=3  );  while(1,    if(j%2==1,      if(w[j-1]<=#a, w=concat(w, a[w[j-1]]), return(w))    ,      if(w[j-2]<=#b, w=concat(w, b[w[j-2]]), return(w))    );    j++  );  w}allocatemem(10^9)row1(sqrt(3), 10^7) \\ _Colin Barker_, Oct 24 2014
author: _Clark Kimberling_
